Author: LecheFrijole
Text: Don't cut everyone out from your life. Believe me, it sucks. I alienated everyone who loved me from my life, and now I have no one. I wish I had even one person to talk to. Now it's just me and my ED.

Author: dancar22
Text: People definitely would not be better without you. They'd have to grieve and every year and holidays know that you aren't around. Depression is deep, dark, and scary. It's cold and lonely. I know, I'm right here with you. Partial inpatient had helped me a ton with my depression. My eating disorder hasn't been addressed because I have a ton of other shit to work on, but there is hope. There is and I know you don't believe me. Anti depressants help, therapy helps, just opening up to a friend helps. You're in this mess not because of you. You never asked for this, you never wanted it, but what you're feeling is real and its valid. I'm here
